mean_cn: adj. 慈爱的，仁慈的；乐善好施的；慈善的
mean_en: (especially of people in authority) kind, helpful and generous; used in the names of some organizations that give help and money to people in need
sentence: She always likes to be by the side of her benevolent grandmother.
sentence_trans: 她总是喜欢依偎在慈爱的奶奶身边。
word_etyma: bene善，好 + vol意愿 + ent...的 → 好意的
